sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtndamknoifm ( knwldg_id , knwldg_ty_code , orgnzt_id , expert_id , emplyr_id , knwldg_nm , knwldg_cn , kwrd , othbc_at , knwldg_evl , colct_de , evl_de , atch_file_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , dsuse_de ) VALUES ( #knwldgId# , #knwldgTyCode# , #orgnztId# , #expertId# , #emplyrId# , #knwldgNm# , #knwldgCn# , #kwrd# , #othbcAt# , #knwldgEvl# , #colctDe# , #evlDe# , #atchFileId# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE , #dsuseDe# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtndamknoifm SET knwldg_id = #knwldgId# , knwldg_ty_code = #knwldgTyCode# , orgnzt_id = #orgnztId# , expert_id = #expertId# , emplyr_id = #emplyrId# , knwldg_nm = #knwldgNm# , knwldg_cn = #knwldgCn# , kwrd = #kwrd# , othbc_at = #othbcAt# , knwldg_evl = #knwldgEvl# , colct_de = #colctDe# , evl_de = #evlDe# , atch_file_id = #atchFileId# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , dsuse_de = #dsuseDe# WHERE 1 = 1 AND knwldg_id = #knwldgId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtndamknoifm WHERE 1 = 1 AND knwldg_id = #knwldgId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT knwldg_id , knwldg_ty_code , orgnzt_id , expert_id , emplyr_id , knwldg_nm , knwldg_cn , kwrd , othbc_at , knwldg_evl , colct_de , evl_de , atch_file_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , dsuse_de FROM COMTNDAMKNOIFM WHERE knwldg_id = #knwldgId#

SELECT A.KNWLDG_ID , A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE , A.ORGNZT_ID , A.EXPERT_ID , A.EMPLYR_ID , A.KNWLDG_NM , A.KNWLDG_CN , A.KWRD , A.OTHBC_AT , A.KNWLDG_EVL , A.COLCT_DE , A.EVL_DE , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.DSUSE_DE FROM ( SELECT KNWLDG_ID , KNWLDG_TY_CODE , ORGNZT_ID , EXPERT_ID , EMPLYR_ID , KNWLDG_NM , KNWLDG_CN , KWRD , OTHBC_AT , KNWLDG_EVL , COLCT_DE , EVL_DE , ATCH_FILE_ID , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , DSUSE_DE , ROWNUM FROM COMTNDAMKNOIFM WHERE 1=1
KNWLDG_ID = #searchKeyword#
KNWLDG_TY_CODE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY KNWLDG_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNDAMKNOIFM WHERE 1=1
KNWLDG_ID = #searchKeyword#
KNWLDG_TY_CODE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
